offset.description: Offset from which to start listing incidents.

\/api\/incidents.description: Creates a new incident from the submitted data.
\/api\/incidents.documentation: Create a Incident from the submitted data.

notes.description: Add some notes/evidence in text format, it will be attached to the mail report.

evidence_file.description: Evidence file that will be attached to the report

date.description: If no date is selected, the date will be today.

state.description: (open|closed|closed_by_inactivity|removed|unresolved|stand_by). If none is selected, the state will be 'open'.

tlp.description: (red|amber|green|white). If none is selected, the state will be 'green'.

reporter.description: The reporter ID. If none was selected, the reporter will be the logged user or the apikey user.

assigned.description: If none was selected, the incident will remain unassigned.

impact.description: If none is selected, the assigned impact will be Low

urgency.description: If none is selected, the assigned urgency will be Low

sendReport.description: Send a mail report to the host administrator.

400: Returned when the form has errors
